chunks.zh: 2024 年了，还有多少老哥在坚守 PHP 阵地的？
chunks.en: In 2024, how many old timers are still holding the PHP fort?

chunks.zh: 18 年了，感谢 PHP 养活我.
chunks.en: 18 years, thanks to PHP for supporting me.

chunks.zh: 13 年了，刚失业 3 个月，外包又续上了
chunks.en: 13 years, just unemployed for 3 months, outsourcing is back on again

chunks.zh: 我们 FastAdmin 开源后台框架，一直用 php 。感谢 php 。❤️
chunks.en: Our FastAdmin open source backend framework has always used php. Thanks php. ❤️

chunks.zh: 干了 18 年，🐂🍺，大佬
chunks.en: Worked for 18 years, 🐂🍺, big shot

chunks.zh: @yangxiaopeipei 老了呀，40 岁了
chunks.en: @yangxiaopeipei Getting old, 40 years old

chunks.zh: 差不多 10 年
chunks.en: Around 10 years

chunks.zh: 同 18 年
chunks.en: Same 18 years

chunks.zh: 我司人均 PHP ，PHP 天下第一
chunks.en: Our company's average is PHP, PHP is the best in the world

chunks.zh: 15 年半了 php  五年 go老哥外企公司待遇咋样 还要人吗
chunks.en: 15 and a half years of php, five years of go. How is the treatment in a foreign company? Are they still hiring?

chunks.zh: 现在这种遍地失业的环境下，php 做外包，一个人搞点小项目也许还不错
chunks.en: In this environment of widespread unemployment, doing PHP outsourcing and working on small projects alone might be good.

chunks.zh: 有啥坚守的，php 和 go 都写，哪个挣钱干哪个
chunks.en: What's there to stick to? Write both PHP and go, whichever makes money, do that one.

chunks.zh: @F4NNIU #9 接单利器  感谢~  在上面买了很多应用
chunks.en: @F4NNIU #9 Order-taking tool, thanks~ I bought a lot of applications on it

chunks.zh: 过几年 10 后进入职场后：前辈，啥是 PHP 呀？跟我讲讲呗。
chunks.en: In a few years, after the post-2010s enter the workplace: Senior, what is PHP? Tell me about it.

chunks.zh: 没办法呀。17 年入局。 到现在除了 php curd 以外啥也不会了。
chunks.en: There's no way. Entered the field in 2017. Now I don't know anything except php curd.

chunks.zh: 兄弟,还有我,之前写 java,现在写 php,自记账的服务器端大部分逻辑就是 php 写的,没有完美的语言只有合适的语言
chunks.en: Brother, there's me too. I used to write Java, now I write PHP. Most of the logic for the server side of my self-accounting is written in PHP. There is no perfect language, only the right language.

chunks.zh: 写 web php 应该是无敌的
chunks.en: Writing web PHP should be invincible

chunks.zh: @qa2080639 ，感谢支持 FastAdmin 开源社区，插件市场是 FastAdmin 开源社区持续发展下去的方案之一，未来我们会探索更多的开源可持续方案。我们会努力做好 FastAdmin 开源社区，努力为开发者节省更多的时间。让大家有更多的时间读书、健身、开源、投资、旅行，以及帮朋友和陪家人。🤝
chunks.en: @qa2080639, thank you for supporting the FastAdmin open source community. The plugin market is one of the solutions for the sustainable development of the FastAdmin open source community. In the future, we will explore more open source and sustainable solutions. We will work hard to do a good job in the FastAdmin open source community and strive to save more time for developers. Let everyone have more time to read, exercise, open source, invest, travel, and help friends and spend time with family. 🤝

chunks.zh: 18 年前：3P 里唯独不会 Python18 年后：3P 里只会 Python ，其他都手生了
chunks.en: 18 years ago: The only thing I didn't know in 3P was Python. 18 years later: The only thing I know in 3P is Python, everything else is rusty

chunks.zh: 只要还有 laravel 和 wordpress ，PHP 就无比坚挺 z
chunks.en: As long as there are Laravel and WordPress, PHP will be incredibly strong z

chunks.zh: 07 年开始写 php  现在还在写
chunks.en: Started writing PHP in '07, still writing now

chunks.zh: 去年失业  到现在还没找到工作
chunks.en: Unemployed last year and still haven't found a job yet
